tool_description: Tracks and updates work order status, progress, and maintains complete activity history throughout the lifecycle.

work_order_id.description: Work order ID to track or update

action.description: Action to perform: view_status, update_status, add_note, record_progress

new_status.description: New status when updating: assigned, in_progress, on_hold, completed, cancelled

progress_note.description: Progress notes or comments to add

error_messages: Work order not found: The provided work_order_id does not exist.
Invalid action: Use one of [view_status, update_status, add_note, record_progress].
Invalid status transition: The requested status change is not allowed from current status.
Invalid completion percentage: Value must be between 0 and 100.
Missing required parameter: new_status required when action is update_status.
Unauthorized status update: Current user lacks permission to modify this work order status.
usage: Provide work_order_id and action. For status updates, include new_status. For progress tracking, include progress_note and/or completion_percentage. Returns current status and history.

current_status.description: Current status of the work order
